programme.desc: Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)

programme.title: Super Simple Amhráin
programme.desc: Amhrán spraíúil faoi inneall dóiteáin a bheidh againn inniu. (A fun song about a fire truck.)

programme.title: Blocuimhreacha
programme.desc: Insíonn Fiche scéalta do na blocuimhreacha eile agus iad ag dul a chodladh. (Twenty tells the numberblocks stories as they fall asleep.)

programme.title: Blocdhathanna
programme.desc: Tá na Dathanna ag iarraidh Bogha Ceatha a dhathú. (The Colours attempt to Colour in a Rainbow.)

programme.title: CoComelon It's Cody Time
programme.desc: Bí ag gabháil fhoinn le Cody agus é ag spraoi lena dheirfiúr óg. (Sing along as Cody follows his baby sister around.)

programme.title: CoComelon JJ's Animal
programme.desc: Cé go mbíonn Emmy agus Mimi ina gcónaí le chéile níl cosúlacht ar bith acu le chéile. (Emmy and Mimi may live together, but they are about as different as can be.)

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Tá gach uile dhuine ag iarraidh dul ar an luascán nó dul chuig an leithreas inniu. (Everyone wants to ride the swings, drink from the fountain, or go to the bathroom!)

programme.title: Ó a Sheáin
programme.desc: Dúisíonn damhán alla Seán & tosaíonn ag spraoi lena fheadóg dhearg & lena thraein dhonn. (Seán is woken up by a spider and begins to play with his red whistle & his train.)

programme.title: Pip & Posy
programme.desc: Téann Posy ag léimneach sna locháin bháistí ina cuid buataisí nua gorma. (Posy gets new blue wellingtons and goes puddle jumping with Pip in the rain.)

programme.title: Gailearaí Scú Scú
programme.desc: Clár ealaíne ina ndéanann Máire Treasa ceardaíocht agus ealaín lena cara Scú Scú Scuab. (An exciting art series where Máire Treasa does arts and crafts with Scú Scú Scuab.)

programme.title: Seó Luna
programme.desc: Déanann Deaide a dhícheall gáire a bhaint as Luna. (Dad tries to make Luna laugh and makes her wonder why we laugh.)

programme.title: Seó Luna
programme.desc: Meas tú céard a fhoghlaimeoidh an fhoireann nuair a ligfidh siad orthu féin gur sár-laochra iad? (What will the team learn when they become make believe super heroes?)

programme.title: Nuair a Bheidh Mé Mór
programme.desc: Samhlaíonn Sonaí a shaol ina fhear poist nuair a bheidh sé mór, le cúnamh ó Shióg na bPost. (Sonaí imagines his life as a postman when he grows up with the help of the Job Fairy.)

programme.title: Daisy & Ollie
programme.desc: Fiosraíonn na páistí cé chomh fada a thógann sé ar litir teacht sa bpost. (The friends ask Postman Geoff how long it takes for a letter to arrive.)

programme.title: Dot
programme.desc: Tá Dot agus Hal ag iarraidh cúnamh a thabhairt do dhaoine. (Dot and Hal wish to help people.)

programme.title: Ainmhithe Craiceáilte
programme.desc: Ar chlár an lae inniu, beidh madra ag spraoi sa sneachta agus cocaitíl ar aiste bia nua. (On today's programme, we have a dog's first snow day and a cockatiel's new diet.)

programme.title: Comhrá
programme.desc: Is é Dom Mag Fhloinn a bheidh ag comhrá le Máirtín Tom Sheáinín ar an gclár. (Máirtín Tom Sheáinín will be chatting with Dom Mag Fhloinn on the show.)

programme.title: The Wonder Years
programme.desc: Baineann Kevin an-sásamh as rang Béarla Iníon Shaw. (English becomes fascinating for Kevin when young Miss Shaw brings her own unique brand of teaching to class.)

programme.title: Geantraí
programme.desc: As Teach Tábhairne E.J. Kings sa Chlochán a chraolfar clár na seachtaine seo. (This programme comes from E.J. Kings in Clifden. Presented by flute player Marcus Hernon.)

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Iarrann Stan ar Dorothy é a phósadh. (Stan proposes and Dorothy must reveal the truth to Sophia.)

programme.title: Murder She Wrote
programme.desc: Dúnmharaítear duine d'ealaíontóirí clúiteacha Cabot Cove agus caithfidh Jessica é a fhiosrú. (Jessica investigates the murder of one of Cabot Cove's world famous artists.)

programme.title: Glór Tíre - Súil Siar
programme.desc: Ceol den scoth ar Glór Tíre 2023 le David James, Louise Morrissey, John Mc Nicholl agus Mike Denver. (The best of country music performances from the stars of Glór Tíre 2023.)

programme.title: Taste of Australia with Hayden Quinn
programme.desc: Tugann Hayden aghaidh ar fheirm dhéiríochta agus monarcha ime sa gclár seo. (Hayden is heading to see a dairy farm and butter factory in action.)

programme.title: Glór Tíre - Rogha & Togha
programme.desc: Beidh Jimmy Buckley agus Alan Tobin ar stáitse sa gclár seo. (Jimmy Buckley and Alan Tobin will perform on the show.)

programme.title: Escape from the City
programme.desc: Tá an lánúin óg Colette agus Joe tinn d'árasáin a bheith acu ar cíos in Sydney. (Colette and Joe have had enough of rental properties in Sydney's swanky Eastern Suburbs.)

programme.desc: Tugann Gráinne McElwain aghaidh ar Chontae Cheatharlach sa gclár seo. (Gráinne McElwain is back on the road again as she travels to Carlow.)

programme.title: GAA Beo
programme.desc: Craoladh beo ar Chluiche Leathcheannais na Mumhan i gCraobh Iomána F20 oneills.com. (Live coverage of the Munster Semi Final in the U20 oneills.com Hurling Championship.)

programme.title: Glór Tíre Rogha & Togha
programme.desc: Beidh Elaine Boyle i dteanna Robert Mizzell ar chlár na hoíche anocht. (Highlights from the last series of Glór Tíre with country music from Elaine Boyle and Robert Mizzell.)

programme.title: Téacs Taistil

programme.title: The Twelve
